block.simplycaterpillar.drill_head.no_fu: You need to add a fuel source to power on.
block.simplycaterpillar.drill_head.not_f: You must connect the block to the drill head.
block.simplycaterpillar.blocks.already_c: There is already a %s connected to the caterpillar.
simplycaterpillar.config.first_use: Show the tutorial if first time use ?
simplycaterpillar.config.break_unbreakab: Can the drill head break unbreakable blocks, like bedrock, end portal frame, etc ?
simplycaterpillar.config.enable_sounds: Does the drill make noise when it moves ?
simplycaterpillar.tutorial.drill_head.wh: Use the mouse wheel to see the storage.
simplycaterpillar.tutorial.drill_head.po: Click on power button to turn On/Off
simplycaterpillar.tutorial.incinerator:
Set blocks you don't want to keep
   on the drill's gathered inventory.
simplycaterpillar.tutorial.reinforcement:
These are the options for each side
Mouse over them to see what they are

Click to toggle
Red = off
Green = on

These are the blocks it will replace with.
No block means it will not replace it.
You must have the blocks in the drill to place them.
simplycaterpillar.tutorial.decoration:
The decoration places blocks in a pattern
that repeats every 10 blocks (0-9).
simplycaterpillar.tutorial.decoration.mo: Use the wheel to select which section.
simplycaterpillar.tutorial.decoration.cu: The blue number is where the drill is now.
simplycaterpillar.tutorial.transporter:
The transporter will take items from
the drill head's gathered inventory
and put them in the minecart chest.
simplycaterpillar.tutorial.transporter.i:
When the transporter is full,
it will release the minecart chest.
simplycaterpillar.tutorial.transporter.n:
To start transporting,
you need to put a minecart chest
in the drill head's consumption inventory.
